title: New client patch 6.22 doesn't work
body: So I just downloaded the new client and right after pressing play league does not open anymore, I tried restarting pc etc it still doesn't work can someone help me fix this problem?

replies.body: Guys i've solved, go into C:/Riot Games/League of Legends and run lol.launcher.admin.exe. It worked for me

A fix that worked for me guys -
1. Right click League Shortcut
2. Click Properties
3. Click on Advanced Under Shortcut Tab
4. Run as Administrator
5. Try Opening League and if it works, from here on out it should work fine

I fixed my problem, The thing was that i was lounching it on the old shortcut, if you go to the start menu there should be the new LOL shortcut and just start it from that onei think that should fix it lel

This may be a security setting issue that's not allowing the client to launch.  Check out the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for some steps towards restoring access.  Let me know if you have any questions.
I'm having the same problem here ;(

but i think they will fix it tomorrow
(i hope)


(you can try to reinstall it) im going to do it now
